referralTerms: Referral must be a new customer (first-time booking with Pack Move Go)
Friend must complete their move to qualify for rewards
Rewards are paid within 30 days of completed move
No limit on number of referrals you can make
Referral rewards cannot be combined with other promotions
Pack Move Go reserves the right to modify terms at any time
Referral must mention your name or use your unique referral link
Minimum move value of $200 required for referral to qualify

successStories.name: Sarah Johnson
successStories.story: I moved with Pack Move Go last year and was really impressed. When friends asked for recommendations, I started sharing my referral link. It's been nice earning some extra cash while helping people find a good moving company. The team is professional and they actually show up on time!

successStories.name: Michael Chen
successStories.story: I work in real estate and my clients are always moving. After using Pack Move Go for my own move, I started recommending them. The referral rewards add up, which is nice, but honestly I'd recommend them anyway - they're reliable and don't damage stuff.

successStories.name: Shey Rodriguez
successStories.story: My family moved here from out of state and Pack Move Go made it way less stressful than I expected. I mentioned it to a few coworkers who were also moving, and they all had good experiences too. The referral money was a nice surprise - helped cover some of the moving costs.
